member.name: T:MathLogic.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MathLogic.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MathLogic.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

members.member:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project : MathLogic Class : CalculatorMathLogic -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Holds the Math Logic for the calculator. This includes basic functions like addition and subtraction but it also handles converting from a given base to decimal (base 10) and vice versa
[Marcus] 2/20/2017 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.Addition(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: This function adds two numbers and returns the result

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.Subtraction(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: This function subtracts two numbers and returns the result
member.param: The number to be subtracted from

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.Division(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: This function divides two numbers and returns the result
member.param: The number to be divided by

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.Multiplication(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: This function multiplies two numbers and returns the result
member.param: The first number to be multiply
The second number to be multiply

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.ConvertToDecimal(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function converts a number in a base other than 10 to decimal (base 10)
member.param: The number to be converted to Decimal in string form
The current base system the first number is in
member.returns: The first number as a decimal (base 10)

member.name: M:MathLogic.CalculatorMathLogic.ConvertFromDecimal(System.Decimal,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function converts a number from Decimal (base 10) to any other base
member.param: This is the number to be converted
This is the base that you would like to convert to
member.returns: The number entered (base 10) converted to the specified base
